Alchemical Resolve.name: Alchemical Resolve
Alchemical Resolve.description: You rapidly apply alchemical vapours which instill your ally with supplemental bravery in the face of horror.

Alchemical Resolve.name: Alchemical Resolve
Alchemical Resolve.description: You rapidly bolster the Morale of an ally within 4 feet by applying vapours. Perform a Medicine Check against the target's Madness Threshold. Successful checks restore Morale.

Anticipate Harm.name: Anticipate Harm
Anticipate Harm.description: Your keen reflexes and acuity allow you to anticipate imminent danger and react to avoid it.

Anticipate Harm.name: Anticipate Harm
Anticipate Harm.condition: You are targeted by an area-of-effect attack, the source of which you can see.
Anticipate Harm.description: You may immediately Move 1 space after the area-of-effect of the attack is declared. If this movement escapes the area of the attack, you are unaffected.

Arcane Archer.name: Arcane Archer
Arcane Archer.description:
Your skill with archery can shape your spellcraft, partially substituting for the somatic gestures of traditional spellcasting. With a ranged weapon equipped you ignore the free-hand requirement for casting spells that use the Arrow gesture.

After performing a Strike with a projectile weapon, you may cast a spell using the Arrow gesture during the same Turn with Action Cost reduced by 1.

Archery Training.name: Archery Training
Archery Training.description:
You are educated and trained in the arts of projectile weaponry like bows, crossbows, firearms, and slings.

You gain a +1 Skill bonus to attacks using ranged weapons in the Projectile or Mechanical category.

Armored Efficiency.name: Armored Efficiency
Armored Efficiency.description: You are trained in wearing the heaviest types of armor while still retaining mobility. You are able to use a free Movement action once per Turn while wearing Heavy armor.

Artful Parry.name: Artful Parry
Artful Parry.description: You anticipate dodging an attack, intercepting it to intentionally Parry the strike.

Artful Parry.name: Artful Parry
Artful Parry.condition: You Dodge an incoming melee Strike.
Artful Parry.description: When you defend against a melee attack using the Dodge defense, you can react and expend Focus to instead Parry the attack.

Assassin.name: Assassin
Assassin.description:
You specialize in bringing death the the unwary. Any Strike or Spell attack against an Unaware target becomes Deadly.

An Unaware creature hit by your attack may not alert its allies until its own turn in Combat.

Mark For Death.name: Mark For Death
Mark For Death.description: You spend 1 minute studying a creature. Perform a Knowledge Test about your target. If successful, you learn all damage types against which the target is Vulnerable. Your minimum Initiative during the first round of Combat becomes one greater than the Initiative of your marked target.

Assess Strength.name: Assess Strength
Assess Strength.description:
You take a moment to observe a creature which you can see and develop intuition about its areas of strength.

Perform a Knowledge Test using a Skill chosen by the Gamemaster. On a success, you learn which Defense type of Physical, Fortutude, Willpower, or Reflex is highest for the creature. On a Critical Success you learn the two highest defense types.

Assess Strength.name: Assess Strength
Assess Strength.description: You observe a creature you can see to assess it's notable areas of strength.

Backstab.name: Backstab
Backstab.description: You focus your cunning instincts on exploiting the weak points of a flanked target. You identify an opportunity and strike with deadly efficiency.

Backstab.name: Backstab
Backstab.condition: You are attacking a target with the Flanked condition.
Backstab.description: You Strike with your mainhand weapon against a Flanked target, dealing Deadly damage.

Battle Focus.name: Battle Focus
Battle Focus.description: You find focus and calm within the thrill of battle. When you achieve a Critical Hit that deals damage to Health or Morale you gain +1 Focus. This benefit may occur at most once per Round.

Beastmaster.name: Beastmaster
Beastmaster.description: You have trained your animal companion to aid you in combat. Your companion may participate in encounters as an allied combatant.

Berserker.name: Berserker
Berserker.description: You revel in the thrill of combat, hurling yourself into the fray with reckless abandon.

Berserker Rage.name: Berserker Rage
Berserker Rage.condition: You have suffered damage to your Health pool since your last turn in Combat.
Berserker Rage.description: You become Enraged. While Enraged you deal 4 additional damage on all melee attacks. You may attempt to end the effect on your own turn by succeeding on a Willpower test against a DC of 20. The effect ends automatically when Combat is concluded.

Blood Frenzy.name: Blood Frenzy
Blood Frenzy.description: Your battle lust spurs you to feats of heightened action. When you achieve a Critical Hit that deals damage to Health you immediately gain +1 Action. This benefit may only happen once per Round.

Blood Magic.name: Blood Magic
Blood Magic.description: You rely upon occult techniques to transform physical pain into arcane potential. You cast spells by spending Health instead of Focus. When casting a spell each point of Focus costs 10 points of Health.

Bloodletter.name: Bloodletter
Bloodletter.description:
Your precision with weapons which deal Slashing or Piercing damage can cause the Bleeding condition on Critical Hits which deal damage to Health.

The Bleeding effect lasts for 1 round and deals your Dexterity score as additional damage to Health.

Body Block.name: Body Block
Body Block.description: You lean into an attack which was otherwise defended with your Armor, converting its result into a Block instead.

Body Block.name: Body Block
Body Block.condition: You defend against a melee attack with your Armor or as a Glance.
Body Block.description: An attack which otherwise is defended by your Armor or produced a Glancing blow is converted to a Block and deals no damage.

Bull Rush.name: Bull Rush
Bull Rush.description: You can use your physical prowess to push past opponents who block your path.

Bull Rush.name: Bull Rush
Bull Rush.description: Make a Pathfinding skill Attack against an adjacent enemy contested by your target's Fortitude defense. On a success you may move up to your Stride directly through the enemy's space. Your enemy is knocked Prone and may not make any attack of opportunity against you. On a failure your movement is blocked and your remain in your current position.

Bulwark.name: Bulwark
Bulwark.description:
You have expertise in using a Shield to defend yourself and others.

Once per Turn while you have a Shield equipped, you may use the Defend action at a reduced cost of 1 Action Point.

Cadence.name: Cadence
Cadence.description: You are drilled in performing sequences of melee attacks with rhythmic precision. When you Strike multiple times in sequence using a one-handed melee weapon you gain a stacking +1 Boon for each successive attack.

Carefree.name: Carefree
Carefree.description:
You are able to compartmentalize and brush off setbacks, providing a remarkable ability to recover from damage to your Morale.

Your Madness Threshold is reduced by 1, making you easier to heal.

Clarify Intent.name: Clarify Intent
Clarify Intent.description: You use apply your situational awareness and persuasiveness to rapidly communicate a plan of action to an ally.

Clarify Intent.name: Clarify Intent
Clarify Intent.description: You explain your intentions to an ally within 3 spaces. Make an Diplomacy skill attack against your ally's Madness Threshold. If successful they gain +1 Focus and +1 Boon to actions made within the next Round.

Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.description: This martial technique is a specialized two-handed fighting maneuver which relies upon brute strength to swing your weapon in a wide arc, hitting multiple enemies in its path.

Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.description: A ferocious two-handed swing cleaves through foes in a 120 degree arc.

Combat Medicine.name: Combat Medicine
Combat Medicine.description: Your knowledge and skill in Medicine covers the rapid triage, diagnosis, and treatment of wounds.

Combat Medicine.name: Combat Medicine
Combat Medicine.description: You rapidly treat the wounds of an ally within 4 feet. Perform a Medicine Check against the target's Wounds Threshold. Your ally's Health is increased by the amount of the Roll in excess of the threshold.

Concussive Blows.name: Concussive Blows
Concussive Blows.description:
Your physical power wielding melee weapons which deal Bludgeoning damage can cause the Staggered condition on Critical Hits which deal damage to Health.

The Staggered effect lasts for 1 round and reduces your target's maximum Action by 1.

Conjurer.name: Conjurer
Conjurer.description: You are a master of Conjuration and the Gesture of Creation to manifest arcane energy as physical form. You can maintain up to 3 such creations simultaneously rather than only one.

Conserve Effort.name: Conserve Effort
Conserve Effort.description: You find calmness and focus in conserving your effort in battle. When you end your Turn with un-spent Action you gain +1 Focus.

Counter Evade.name: Counter Evade
Counter Evade.description: You are practiced in evasive fighting styles which use an enemy's missed attack to devise an opening to counter-attack.

Counter Evade.name: Counter Evade
Counter Evade.condition: You Dodge an incoming melee Strike.
Counter Evade.description: When you defend against a melee attack with a Dodge, you may expend Focus to retaliate with a reduced-cost Strike using your mainhand weapon.

Counter Riposte.name: Counter Riposte
Counter Riposte.description: You are expert in translating a parried attack into a swift counter against your exposed enemy.

Counter Riposte.name: Counter Riposte
Counter Riposte.condition: You Parry an incoming melee Strike.
Counter Riposte.description: When you defend against a melee attack with a Parry, you may react and expend Focus to retaliate with a reduced-cost Strike which benefits from the Exposed condition.

Counter Spell.name: Counter Spell
Counter Spell.description:
You can attempt to unravel and negate the spellcraft of other mages.

Counter-Spell mechanics are preliminary and not implemented in Playtest 1. You may test the intention of this talent by working with your GM, but this process will not be refined or automated until a later Playtest phase.

Counter Spell.name: Counter Spell
Counter Spell.condition: Another creature which you can see is casting a spell.
Counter Spell.description: You form arcane energy into a countervailing spellcraft. Designate a Rune and Gesture which you know to attempt to counter the spell. You must be able to hit your target with your chosen Gesture. Choosing a Rune which is opposed to the Rune being cast adds +3 Boons to your roll. Choosing the same Gesture as the one being cast adds +3 Boons to your roll. Perform an Opposed Test against the caster of the spell using the Ability, Skill, and Enchantment bonuses of the respective spells being cast. If your roll exceeds theirs, the spell is countered and its magic is nullified.

Counter Strike.name: Counter Strike
Counter Strike.description: You are trained to transition between defending with your shield and a swift counter-attack.

Counter Strike.name: Counter Strike
Counter Strike.condition: You Block an incoming melee Strike.
Counter Strike.description: When you defend against a melee attack with a Block you may expend Focus to retaliate with a reduced-cost Strike using your mainhand weapon.

Defensive Roll.name: Defensive Roll
Defensive Roll.description: You are a nimble skirmisher, always in movement to stay one step ahead of your enemies in combat.

Defensive Roll.name: Defensive Roll
Defensive Roll.condition: You Dodge an incoming melee Strike.
Defensive Roll.description: When you Dodge a melee attack you can expend Focus to leap into a defensive roll, moving up to your Size in any direction.

Dervish.name: Dervish
Dervish.description: You are specialized in fighting with two weapons. In combat you become a whirlwind of weapons, deadly to any foes who approach.

Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
Whirlwind.description: You become a cyclone of whirling weaponry, making Strike attacks with both weapons against every enemy within range.

Dirty Tricks.name: Dirty Tricks
Dirty Tricks.description: You have pouches of sand and dust that you use to temporarily distract or blind an enemy.

Dirty Tricks.name: Dirty Tricks
Dirty Tricks.description: You fling debris into the eyes of an enemy. If the Strike is successful, they are Blinded until the end of their next Turn.

Disarming Strike.name: Disarming Strike
Disarming Strike.description: A martial technique designed to disarm your opponent, forcing them to drop an object held in one of their hands.

Disarming Strike.name: Disarming Strike
Disarming Strike.description:
You make a Strike against a the Reflex defense of a single target. The technique is Difficult to perform and deals reduced damage. If successful, the target is forced to unqeuip a held item of your choosing that is not secured.

TODO: Add automation for the Disarm effect.

Distance Runner.name: Distance Runner
Distance Runner.description: You are adept at covering distance quickly. Your Stride increases by 1.

Diversionist.name: Diversionist
Diversionist.description: You specialize in using subterfuge to distract or trick your opponent during combat.

Distract.name: Distract
Distract.description: You make a Deception based Skill Attack against the Willpower defense of a target within 30 feet which can see or hear you. On a success, the target loses 1 Focus.

Dread Lord.name: Dread Lord
Dread Lord.description: You exude a terrible presence on the battlefield which tests the morale of nearby enemies that behold you, breaking the resolve of the weak-willed.

Formidable Presence.name: Formidable Presence
Formidable Presence.description: You make an Intimidation skill attack against the Willpower defense of enemies within 3 spaces, dealing Void damage to Morale and causing the Frightened condition for 1 Round to those whose defense you overcome.

Dual Wield.name: Dual Wield
Dual Wield.description: You are adept at fighting with two weapons simultaneously. You can weave attacks together to strike more rapidly than possible with a single weapon.

Offhand Strike.name: Offhand Strike
Offhand Strike.description: Immediately after you perform a basic Strike with your mainhand weapon, you make a reduced-cost fullow-up Strike with your offhand weapon.

Dustbinder.name: Dustbinder
Dustbinder.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Earth. Spells which use this Rune cause the Corroding condition on Critical Hits.

The Corroding effect lasts for 3 Rounds and deals your Wisdom score as Acid damage to Health each Round.

Evasive Shot.name: Evasive Shot
Evasive Shot.description: You are an expert at firing shots with ranged weaponry while evading enemy attacks. After performing a ranged weapon attack, you gain your Stride in additional free movement.

Executioner's Strike.name: Executioner's Strike
Executioner's Strike.description: You deliver a single decisive strike against a wounded enemy.

Executioner's Strike.name: Executioner's Strike
Executioner's Strike.description: You deliver a Deadly Strike with a two-handed heavy weapon. If your attack is successful, your opponent also suffers the Bleeding condition for 3 Rounds, taking additional damage each Round equal to your Strength score.

Extoll Deeds.name: Extoll Deeds
Extoll Deeds.description: You inspire courage within your allies by extolling the heroic deeds of a companion. You may react by composing a verse, making a quip, or shouting a battle cry when an ally you can see Incapacitates or achieves a Critical Hit against an enemy creature. The celebration of these heroic deeds restores the Morale of your allies within 6 spaces.

Extoll Deeds.name: Extoll Deeds
Extoll Deeds.condition: An ally whom you can see slays or scores a critical hit against an enemy.
Extoll Deeds.description: You compose a verse, make a quip, or shout a battle cry to extoll the heroic deeds of one of your allies. Make a Performance check against your allies' Madness threshold, restoring Morale to those who can perceive your performance.

Eye of the Storm.name: Eye of the Storm
Eye of the Storm.description:
After you Delay your Turn, gain +2 Boons on any Strike or Spell attack against an enemy that you allowed to act before you that Round.

TODO: Needs automation. For now apply boons manually.

Fan of Arrows.name: Fan of Arrows
Fan of Arrows.description: This difficult ranged weaponry technique allows you to fire a multiple shots with your weapon in a sweeping cone, each targeting a different enemy in the area of effect.

Fan of Arrows.name: Fan of Arrows
Fan of Arrows.description: You fire multiple projectiles from your ranged weapon in an arc, striking all enemy targets within a 40 foot cone.

Feinting Strike.name: Feinting Strike
Feinting Strike.description: A two-weapon technique which makes a feint with your primary weapon, exposing your target for an off-hand attack.

Feinting Strike.name: Feinting Strike
Feinting Strike.description:
You feint with your mainhand weapon, making a Deception attack against the target's Reflex defense. You immediately make a Strike with your offhand weapon.

If your Deception was successful, you gain +2 Boons to your Strike and it deals an additional +6 Damage.

Ferocious Leap.name: Ferocious Leap
Ferocious Leap.description: You leap powerfully into battle to deliver a punishing blow to a nearby enemy.

Ferocious Leap.name: Ferocious Leap
Ferocious Leap.description: You leap up to 10 feet and perform a Strike against an enemy within melee range of where you land. Your movement ignores difficult terrain and is not blocked by enemy creatures.

Finesse Weapon Training.name: Finesse Weapon Training
Finesse Weapon Training.description:
You are educated and trained in the arts if wielding weapons which require a combination of nimble agility and martial proficiency.

You gain a +1 Skill bonus to attacks using melee weapons in the Light or Balanced categories.

Flurry.name: Flurry
Flurry.description: A martial technique using two weapons to overwhelm a single target with a relentless sequence of attacks.

Flurry.name: Flurry
Flurry.description: You Strike twice with each weapon, but each strike is Difficult.

Flying Kick.name: Flying Kick
Flying Kick.description: An unarmed technique where you launch yourself while running at an enemy in a leaping kick which is empowered to deal additional damage.

Flying Kick.name: Flying Kick
Flying Kick.description: Move forward between 3 feet and 6 feet in a straight line to kick an enemy with an empowered Strike.

Focused Anticipation.name: Focused Anticipation
Focused Anticipation.description: Anticipation leads to decisive action. When you have the highest Initiative score for a Round of combat, you gain +1 Focus.

Fulcrum.name: Fulcrum
Fulcrum.description: Balance, positioning, and leverage are your greatest allies in combat. You know how to use a foe's momentum against them and that a small redirection in force can turn the tide of battle.

Conserve Momentum.name: Conserve Momentum
Conserve Momentum.condition: You Block, Parry, or Dodge an incoming melee Strike.
Conserve Momentum.description: You redirect the force of a melee attack which misses you, pivoting it to instead hit some other adjacent enemy. Your attacker must re-roll their attack targetting their ally instead.

Gesture: Arrow.name: Gesture: Arrow
Gesture: Arrow.description:
Hurl a projectile of magical power at a distant target. This might use the Lightning Rune to hurl a lightning bolt, or the Shadow rune to hurl a ball of devouring darkness.

The Arrow gesture scales using Intellect and targets a single creature up to a distance of 10 spaces, dealing 10 base damage on a successful attack.

Gesture: Aspect.name: Gesture: Aspect
Gesture: Aspect.description:
Infuse the essence of a Rune into the self, empowering your own physical form or psyche.

When you assume a certain Aspect, you become more closely attuned to the damage type of the Rune used in your spell. You gain +2 Resistance to that damage type, and deal an additional +2 Damage whenever dealing damage of that type.

Your Aspect lasts for 6 Rounds. You may only have one active Aspect, casting another spell using the Aspect gesture replaces the previous effect.

Gesture: Create.name: Gesture: Create
Gesture: Create.description:
Coalesce arcane power into tangible form, conjuring a Creation which appears in an adjacent space and joins Combat at Initiative 1.

Your Creation is a Minion of half your own Level chosen from the Summoned Creatures compendium pack corresponding to the Rune used in the spell.

The Creation lasts for 10 Rounds. You may only have one active Creation, casting another spell using the Create gesture replaces your previous Creation.

Gesture: Fan.name: Gesture: Fan
Gesture: Fan.description:
Focus the essence of a rune into a sweeping or splintered arc to strike multiple targets in close proximity. If used with Earth, this might hurl a spray of stone in an arc, while using it with Kinesis might carve a slice across multiple foes.

The Fan gesture scales using Intellect and targets a 120 degree cone with distance 1, dealing 6 base damage on a successful attack.

Gesture: Influence.name: Gesture: Influence
Gesture: Influence.description:
Intensify an arcane phenomenon at close range. Influence could be used with the Flame rune to set a target ablaze or with the Stasis rune to sap their Morale.

The Influence gesture is a more powerful evolution of the basic Touch gesture that is learned with any Rune.

The Influence gesture scales using Presence and targets a single adjacent creature, dealing 12 base damage on a successful attack.

Gesture: Pulse.name: Gesture: Pulse
Gesture: Pulse.description:
Emit a burst of Runic power in a circular wave that travels outward, with you at its center. A Pulse of Spirit might be used to bolster Morale for your allies, while a Death pulse might be used to deal Corruption damage to a group of enemies gathered around you.

The Pulse gesture scales using Presence and targets a 360 degree radius with distance 1, dealing 6 base damage on a successful attack.

Gesture: Ray.name: Gesture: Ray
Gesture: Ray.description:
Focus the power of a Rune into a single point, expelling its energy into a ranged beam which rapidly travels a short distance to a targeted area. If used with Life this might restore the HP of a distant ally steadily over time, while Frost might emit a beam that freezes a target in place.

The Ray gesture scales using Wisdom and targets a line emanating from the caster at distance 6, dealing 6 base damage on a successful attack.

Gesture: Step.name: Gesture: Step
Gesture: Step.description:
Infuse runic power into a movement, crossing physical and spatial boundaries. Move 4 spaces in a straight line, dealing minor damage to enemies or applying restoration to allies in your path.

The Step gesture scales with Dexterity, targets a line with distance 4, dealing 4 base damage on a successful attack.

Gesture: Strike.name: Gesture: Strike
Gesture: Strike.description:
Empower a close-range attack with the essence of a Rune. This rune performs a melee weapon attack targeting the defense and dealing damage of the Rune used in the spell.

The Strike gesture scales using Strength and targets a single adjacent creature, dealing 12 base damage on a successful attack.

Gesture: Ward.name: Gesture: Ward
Gesture: Ward.description:
Focus the power of a Rune into a protective barrier, shielding yourselves and others from harmful effects. When used with the Kinesis rune the Ward reduces incoming damage from a chosen physical damage type while combination with the Death rune protects against Corruption damage.

Your Ward provides +6 Resistance against the damage type of the Rune used in the spell. The Ward lasts for 1 Round.

You may only have a single Ward at a time. Casting another spell using the Ward gesture replaces your prior Ward.

Gladiator.name: Gladiator
Gladiator.description: Once per Round, you can make a Reaction which incorporates a Strike attack without spending any Focus.

Hamstring.name: Hamstring
Hamstring.description: You use a slashing weapon to target the legs of an enemy and cripple their movement.

Hamstring.name: Hamstring
Hamstring.description: You make Strike attack which is Difficult, but if successful, inflicts the Slowed condition for 3 Rounds.

Healer.name: Healer
Healer.description: You are unparalleled at manipulating vital arcana to treat injuries. You learn Rune: Life if you do not already know it. When healing allies using the Rune of Life you gain +2 Boons to your roll.

Font of Life.name: Font of Life
Font of Life.description: You bring forth an aura of life-giving magic. Immediately upon activation and at the start of your turn for 3 Rounds every ally within 20 feet heals for an amount equal to your Wisdom score.

Heavy Strike.name: Heavy Strike
Heavy Strike.description: You know how to use a heavy weapon to deliver punishing blows, putting your entire strength behind every swing.

Heavy Strike.name: Heavy Strike
Heavy Strike.description: You unleash a powerful Strike with your mainhand weapon. The attack is slower to execute, but is Empowered to deliver additional damage.

Hold Fast.name: Hold Fast
Hold Fast.description: You are a calm anchor in the swirling sea of combat. Your Engagement increases by +1, allowing you to simultaneously engage more adjacent foes.

Impetus.name: Impetus
Impetus.description: You are gifted at exploiting the slowness with which others think. If you are first in Initiative order during a round of Combat, you gain +1 current and maximum Action.

Inflection: Compose.name: Inflection: Compose
Inflection: Compose.description: Enhance a spell by taking extra time in its formation, reducing other resource costs in exchange. The Compose inflection reduces the Focus cost of a spell by 1 while increasing its Action cost by 1 in exchange.

Inflection: Determine.name: Inflection: Determine
Inflection: Determine.description: Enhance a spell to make it more difficult to counter. Any attempt to Counter-Spell this spell is made with +2 Banes.

Inflection: Elude.name: Inflection: Elude
Inflection: Elude.description: Enhance a spell to make it more difficult for an enemy to retaliate against its casting. This spell does not provide any opportunity to make reactions that involve Strike attacks, regardless of the results of the spell.

Inflection: Extend.name: Inflection: Extend
Inflection: Extend.description:
Enhance the duration of a spell, increasing the duration of its effect. For spells which are instantaneous, any corresponding status conditions that they cause are increased in duration.

Effect duration increases from the Extend inflection are not yet automated in Playtest 1. This inflection is included as an example of the intended direction for the Spellcraft system.

Inflection: Negate.name: Inflection: Negate
Inflection: Negate.description:
Invert the effect of a spell. An Inverted Life Touch spell which normally heals a target deals Poison damage instead. An Inverted Death Ward spell inflicts vulnerability to Corruption damage upon an adjacent enemy.

The effects of the Negate inflection are not yet automated for Playtest 1. This inflection is included as an example of the intended direction for the Spellcraft system.

Inflection: Pull.name: Inflection: Pull
Inflection: Pull.description: Empower a spell to attract affected creatures toward the caster. Creatures affected by a spell with the Pull inflection move 1 space closer towards the spellcaster if that destination space is unoccupied.

Inflection: Push.name: Inflection: Push
Inflection: Push.description: Empower a spell to repel affected creatures away from the caster. Creatures affected by a spell with the Push inflection move 1 space away from the spellcaster if that destination space is unoccupied.

Inflection: Quicken.name: Inflection: Quicken
Inflection: Quicken.description: Enhance a spell by hastening the speed with which it can be cast, at the expense of increased Focus. The Quicken inflection reduces the Action cost of a spell by 1 while increasing its Focus cost by 1 in exchange.

Inflection: Reshape.name: Inflection: Reshape
Inflection: Reshape.description:
Enhance a Spell by carefully reshaping and controlling its area of effect at the cost of 2 Focus.

Offensive spells which use a template target only target enemies within the area. Healing spells which use a template target only target allies within the area.

Single target spells do not incur any Banes due to intervening creatures.

Inquisitor.name: Inquisitor
Inquisitor.description: You are an expert in combat against magic users. You know how to conserve energy and strike at the precise moment to thwart their incantation.

Inquisitor's Strike.name: Inquisitor's Strike
Inquisitor's Strike.condition: Your target is casting a spell.
Inquisitor's Strike.description: When an enemy within your Engagement radius whom you can see casts a spell, you may react to Strike that target. On a Critical Hit the target's spell is interrupted and the magic is lost.

Inspirator.name: Inspirator
Inspirator.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Spirit. Spells which use this Rune cause the Inspired condition on Critical Hits.

The Inspired effect lasts for 1 Round and deals your Presence score as restoration to Morale.

Inspire Heroism.name: Inspire Heroism
Inspire Heroism.description: Your courageous presence inspires your nearby allies to strike with confidence.

Inspire Heroism.name: Inspire Heroism
Inspire Heroism.description: Each ally, excluding yourself, within 10 Feet gains +1 Boon to actions performed until the end of their next Turn.

Intellectual Superiority.name: Intellectual Superiority
Intellectual Superiority.description: It is sometimes a marvel how slowly others around you think. You gain +1 Boon on any Strike or Spell attack against an enemy lower than you in Initiative order.

Intercept.name: Intercept
Intercept.description: You protect your allies, intercepting blows that might otherwise be directed towards your companions.

Intercept.name: Intercept
Intercept.condition: An enemy moves into or through your Engagement radius.
Intercept.description:
You intercept the path of an enemy which enters your Engagement radius, immediatly moving up to your Stride to interpose yourself and block their path.

If the enemy moves out of your Engagement radius or attacks any other creature during their turn, you may make a Disengagement Strike against them.

Intimidator.name: Intimidator
Intimidator.description: You specialize in exerting your intimidating presence to break the morale of your foes.

Intimidate.name: Intimidate
Intimidate.description: You physically intimidate an enemy that is within your engagement range, performing an Intimidation skill attack against your target. On a success they sustain Void damage to Morale.

Intuit Weakness.name: Intuit Weakness
Intuit Weakness.description: You calm your mind and study the physiology of your foe, seeking a vulnerability in its defenses. The Gamemaster performs a passive Knowledge Test against the enemy. If successful you learn one Damage type that the creature is vulnerable to, if any.

Intuit Weakness.name: Intuit Weakness
Intuit Weakness.description: You still your mind and study the physiology of your foe, attempting to identify a vulnerability in its defenses.

Iramancer.name: Iramancer
Iramancer.description: Your feats of arcana are fueled by anger. While Enraged you may still spend Focus and you deal 2 additional damage to all spell attacks.

Irrepressible Spirit.name: Irrepressible Spirit
Irrepressible Spirit.description: Your tenacity gives you an irrepressible spirit which resists the onset of despair. At the start of your turn if you are not Broken you gain 1 Morale.

Justiciar.name: Justiciar
Justiciar.description: You are an instrument of justice. Critical Strike attacks also deal the Overflow portion of damage to enemy Morale.

Leg Sweep.name: Leg Sweep
Leg Sweep.description: You use a heavy weapon to sweep your enemy off balance, swinging low to knock them from their feet.

Leg Sweep.name: Leg Sweep
Leg Sweep.description: You make a Strike attack with your mainhand weapon. This technique is Difficult to execute and deals reduced damage, but if successful renders your target Prone.

Legerdemain.name: Legerdemain
Legerdemain.description: You can silently alter your spellcraft. You can apply Lesser Inflections using only your hands without the need for vocalization.

Lesser Regeneration.name: Lesser Regeneration
Lesser Regeneration.description: Your prodigious hardiness conveys a supernatural capability to recover from wounds quickly. At the start of your turn if you are not Weakened you gain +1 Health.

Lightbringer.name: Lightbringer
Lightbringer.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Illumination. Spells which use this Rune cause the Irradiated condition on Critical Hits.

The Irradiated effect lasts for 1 Round and deals your Presence score as Radiant damage to both Health and Morale.

Lunge.name: Lunge
Lunge.description: You dart forward nimbly, making a strike with sudden and unexpected swiftness.

Lunge.name: Lunge
Lunge.description: You Strike with your mainhand weapon against a single foe with an increased range of +2 feet. The attack is Difficult, but you do not move from your current position nor does this attack provoke any Disengagement.

Mark Prey.name: Mark Prey
Mark Prey.description: You fire a special shot which deals reduced damage, but explodes in luminous powder clearly marking your target.

Mark Prey.name: Mark Prey
Mark Prey.description: You Strike using a special shot. If your attack is successful the target is Exposed for the next 3 Turns.

Martial Artist.name: Martial Artist
Martial Artist.description: You have honed your body into a dangerous weapon. Your bare fists are treated as weapons of Fine quality, increasing their damage by +1.

Martial Weapon Training.name: Martial Weapon Training
Martial Weapon Training.description:
You are educated and trained in the arts of wielding weapons which require a combination of physical brawn and martial proficiency.

You gain a +1 Skill bonus to attacks using melee weapons in the Simple, Heavy, or Balanced categories.

Mender.name: Mender
Mender.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Life. Spells which use this Rune cause the Mending condition on Critical Hits.

The Mending effect lasts for 1 Round and deals your Wisdom score as restoration to Health.

Mental Fortress.name: Mental Fortress
Mental Fortress.description: Your strong will makes you exceedingly difficult to influence. You gain +1 to your Willpower defense and +5 Psychic resistance.

Mesmer.name: Mesmer
Mesmer.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Control. Spells which use this Rune cause the Confusion condition on Critical Hits.

The Confusion effect lasts for 1 Round, deals half your Intellect score as Psychic damage to Morale, and applies the Disoriented condition.

Mnemonic Realization.name: Mnemonic Realization
Mnemonic Realization.description:
Your sharpened mind is full of secrets and techniques to remember them. Once per Day you may focus your thoughts and attempt to recall a word that sparks your memory.

The Gamemaster must provide you with a one-word clue that is appropriate for your direction of inquiry. It is left to Gamemaster discretion how direct or vague to be with the clue they provide.

Mnemonic Realization.name: Mnemonic Realization
Mnemonic Realization.description: You survey your memories attempting to recall a clue for your current situation.

Monk.name: Monk
Monk.description:
You balance monastic discipline with expertise in martial arts, balancing attack and defense in harmony.

While Unarmored, you gain a +2 bonus to your Reflex and Willpower defenses.

While Unarmed you can use the Double Punch action.

Double Punch.name: Double Punch
Double Punch.description: You Strike twice in the blink of an eye, punching with both arms.

Necromancer.name: Necromancer
Necromancer.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Death. Spells which use this Rune cause the Corrupted condition on Critical Hits.

The Corrupted effect lasts for 3 Rounds and deals your Intellect score as Corruption damage to Health each Round.

Nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
Nosferatu.description:
You are afflicted with a rare blood mutation which allows your wounds to rapidly heal through hematophagy.

You can restore your Health by biting a living target. This attack is made with a Superior Natural weapon which scales using Strength and deals Piercing damage.

Your vulnerability to Radiant damage increases by 10.

Vampiric Bite.name: Vampiric Bite
Vampiric Bite.condition: Your target is a living creature.
Vampiric Bite.description: You grasp an enemy and bite it with sharp incisors, rapidly draining its blood to heal your own wounds. This attack requires a free hand to grasp your target while you feed.

Operator.name: Operator
Operator.description:
You have ice in your veins and remain cool under pressure. Your physical toughness and mental acuity allow you to hone the danger of your situation to achieve the greatest results when the stakes are highest.

While in combat and not Incapacitated, you gain +1 Boon to all checks when you have less than 50% of your maximum Health remaining. You gain +2 Boons to all checks when you have less than 25% of your maximum Health remaining.

Opportunist.name: Opportunist
Opportunist.description: You sieze any opportunity you can to capitalize on an enemy who turns their back on you. You may make a Disengagement Attack even if you are otherwise Fully Engaged, but you do so without the 2 Boons that would ordinarily apply to such an attack.

Opportunistic Spellcraft.name: Opportunistic Spellcraft
Opportunistic Spellcraft.description: Your quick thinking can weave magic to exploit brief windows of opportunity. You may make a Disengagement Attack using the Touch Gesture instead of a melee weapon attack.

Overwatch.name: Overwatch
Overwatch.description: You are an expert in combat against magic users. You know how to conserve energy and strike at the precise moment to thwart their incantation.

Disrupting Shot.name: Disrupting Shot
Disrupting Shot.condition: Your target is casting a spell.
Disrupting Shot.description: When an enemy you can see casts a spell, you may react to Strike that target. The technique is difficult to perform, but on a Critical Hit the target's spell is interrupted and the magic is lost.

Patient Deflection.name: Patient Deflection
Patient Deflection.description: Your expertise with martial arts allows you to dodge or deflect blows as effectively as a heavily armored fighter. While unarmed, half your Wisdom score contributes to your Parry defense.

Penetrating Shot.name: Penetrating Shot
Penetrating Shot.description: You load special ammunition which deals less damage but penetrates directly through a line of targets.

Penetrating Shot.name: Penetrating Shot
Penetrating Shot.description: You fire a shot which penetrates through multiple targets in a direct line.

Perspicacity.name: Perspicacity
Perspicacity.description: You have heightened insight into aspects of your surroundings. You gain +2 Boons to any Awareness skill test which does not rely upon eyesight.

Pinning Shot.name: Pinning Shot
Pinning Shot.description: You fire a tactically placed shot to pin your target against a nearby surface.

Pinning Shot.name: Pinning Shot
Pinning Shot.description: You Strike from distance. The attack is Difficult, however if your target is it it becomes Restrained until the end of their next Turn.

Pistoleer.name: Pistoleer
Pistoleer.description: Your familiarity with mechanical firearms is unmatched. You can perform the Reload action for free once per Round.

Salvo.name: Salvo
Salvo.description: You fire a barrage of attacks using a one-handed mechanical weapon, shooting three times at a target without the need to reload in-between shots.

Planned Defense.name: Planned Defense
Planned Defense.description: You exert strong battlefield judgment to prepare your defenses against the attacks of your foes. Any enemy which acts after you in Initiative order suffers 1 Bane to their spell or weapon attacks against you.

Poisoner.name: Poisoner
Poisoner.description: You can apply Poison to weapons which deal Slashing or Piercing damage. You deal an additional +2 damage whenever you deal Poison damage and your Strikes cause the Poisoned condition on Critical Strikes which deal damage to Health.

Poison Blades.name: Poison Blades
Poison Blades.description: You nimbly lather your blades in toxic alchemical oils which apply the Poisoned condition on Critical Strikes.

Powerful Physique.name: Powerful Physique
Powerful Physique.description: You can wield weapons with the Slow trait and wear Armor with the Bulky trait without suffering Banes to your Initiative rolls.

Practiced Trigonometry.name: Practiced Trigonometry
Practiced Trigonometry.description:
Your quickness of wit allows you to apply the principles of mathematics to compute projectile trajectory.

You gain a +1 Skill Bonus to attacks using Ranged weapons in the Mechanical category.

Precision Shot.name: Precision Shot
Precision Shot.description: You take time to steady your aim and target the weakest point of a foe. You may only get one shot, but you make it count.

Precision Shot.name: Precision Shot
Precision Shot.description: You steady your aim and fire a single accurate shot.

Preparedness.name: Preparedness
Preparedness.description: You seem to always be prepared for the moment at hand. You may sacrifice your free movement for the Round to instead equip an Item from your inventory without spending any Action points.

Preternatural Instinct.name: Preternatural Instinct
Preternatural Instinct.description: Your quickness of mind and body are equally impressive. You gain +2 Boons to all Initiative checks.

Provocateur.name: Provocateur
Provocateur.description: You specialize in barbed repartee crafted to highlight your opponent's shortcomings. In combat you can launch quips which provoke your foes.

Scathing Mockery.name: Scathing Mockery
Scathing Mockery.condition: Your target can hear and understand you.
Scathing Mockery.description: You exaggerate your opponent's shortcomings with a scathing bon mot, performing a Diplomacy skill attack against your target's Willpower. On a success they suffer modest Psychic damage to Morale and become Enraged for 1 Round.

Pyromancer.name: Pyromancer
Pyromancer.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Flame. Spells which use this Rune cause Burning on Critical Hits.

The Burning effect lasts for 1 Round and deals your Intellect score as Fire damage to both Health and Morale.

Rallying Cry.name: Rallying Cry
Rallying Cry.description: You are a battlefield leader, using your presence and voice to harden the resolve of your allies.

Rallying Cry.name: Rallying Cry
Rallying Cry.description: You emit a courageous bellow that inspires Allies within 3 spaces of you to remain stalwart in the face of danger. You perform an Intimidation skill test against the Madness threshold of your allies. On a success, affected allies become Resolute for one Round.

Rapid Reload.name: Rapid Reload
Rapid Reload.description: You focus deeply and calm your nerves to reload your mechanical weapon with exceptional haste.

Recognize Spellcraft.name: Recognize Spellcraft
Recognize Spellcraft.description: You can interpret the arcane incantations of others to discern the nature of their spellcraft. When an enemy within 10 spaces that you can see and hear begins casting a spell, you can identify its Rune if you have mastered that Rune.

Resilient.name: Resilient
Resilient.description:
Your body responds eagerly to healing, demonstrating a remarkable ability to recover from wounds.

Your Wounds Threshold is reduced by 1, making you easier to heal.

Rimecaller.name: Rimecaller
Rimecaller.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Frost. Spells which use this Rune cause the Chilled condition on Critical Hits.

The Chilled effect lasts for 1 Round, deals half your Wisdom score as Frost damage to Health, and applies the Slowed condition.

Rune: Control.name: Rune: Control
Rune: Control.description:
The orderly force of discipline and the mind. The Control rune governs thought, logic and reason. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Spirit.

The Control rune scales using Intellect, targets Willpower, and deals Psychic damage to Morale.

Rune: Death.name: Rune: Death
Rune: Death.description:
The orderly force of destruction, responsible for the decay of all matter. The Death rune governs decay and destruction. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Life.

The Death rune scales using Intellect, targets Fortitude, and deals Corruption damage to Health.

Rune: Earth.name: Rune: Earth
Rune: Earth.description:
The orderly force of elemental earth, responsible for physical matter. The Earth rune governs health and matters relating to biological growth. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Lightning.

The Earth rune scales using Wisdom, targets Reflex, and deals Acid damage to Health.

Rune: Flame.name: Rune: Flame
Rune: Flame.description:
The chaotic force of elemental, thermal energy. The Flame rune governs fire and heat. It is opposed by the orderly rune of Frost.

The Flame rune scales using Intellect, targets Reflex, and deals Fire damage to Health.

Rune: Frost.name: Rune: Frost
Rune: Frost.description:
The orderly force of elemental, thermal energy. The Frost rune governs sources of ice and cold. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Flame.

The Frost rune scales using Wisdom, targets Fortitude, and deals Cold damage to Health.

Rune: Illumination.name: Rune: Illumination
Rune: Illumination.description:
The chaotic force of light and positive energy. The Illumination rune governs light and all of its properties. It is opposed by the orderly rune of Shadow.

The Illumination rune scales using Presence, targets Willpower, and deals Radiant damage to Health.

Rune: Kinesis.name: Rune: Kinesis
Rune: Kinesis.description:
The chaotic force of space and physical movement. The Kinesis rune governs all things related to the act of movement and physicality. It is opposed by the orderly rune of Stasis.

The Kinesis rune scales using Presence, targets Physical defense, and deals Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage to Health.

Rune: Life.name: Rune: Life
Rune: Life.description:
The chaotic force of creation, responsible for all living matter. The Life rune governs health and matters relating to biological growth. It is opposed by the orderly rune of Death.

The Life rune scales using Wisdom and provides Restoration of Health.

Rune: Lightning.name: Rune: Lightning
Rune: Lightning.description:
The chaotic force of raw, electrical energy. The Lightning rune governs sources of electrical energy and electrical discharge. It is opposed by the orderly rune of Earth.

The Lightning rune scales using Intellect, targets Reflex, and deals Electrical damage to Health.

Rune: Shadow.name: Rune: Shadow
Rune: Shadow.description:
The orderly force of darkness and negative energy. The Shadow rune governs darkness and all of its properties. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Illumination.

The Shadow rune scales using Presence, targets Fortitude, and deals Void damage to Morale.

Rune: Spirit.name: Rune: Spirit
Rune: Spirit.description:
The chaotic force of emotion and willfulness. The Spirit rune governs matters related to emotional well-being as well as the soul. It is opposed by the orderly rune of Control.

The Spirit rune scales using Presence and provides Restoration of Morale.

Rune: Stasis.name: Rune: Stasis
Rune: Stasis.description:
The orderly force of immutability and potential energy. The Stasis rune governs all things related to permanence and resistance to change. It is opposed by the chaotic rune of Kinesis.

The Stasis rune scales using Wisdom, targets Physical defense, and deals Bludgeoning, Piercing, or Slashing damage to Morale.

Runewarden.name: Runewarden
Runewarden.description:
Your mastery of the arcane makes you more resilient to elemental and spiritual harm. You gain a bonus to Resistance equal to half your Wisdom for each Elemental or Spiritual damage type where you know the Arcane Rune attuned to that damage type.

When you use the Ward gesture, the Resistance provided by your Ward also increases by half your Wisdom.

Ruthless Momentum.name: Ruthless Momentum
Ruthless Momentum.description: You relish the carnage you can cause with a two-handed weapon. After defeating a foe, you continue your attack with ruthless momentum, moving to strike another enemy at reduced cost.

Ruthless Momentum.name: Ruthless Momentum
Ruthless Momentum.condition: You incapacitate an enemy with a melee attack.
Ruthless Momentum.description: After defeating an enemy, you may move up to your Stride and attack another foe within melee range.

Safecracker.name: Safecracker
Safecracker.description: You are skilled in the arts of disarming traps and picking locks. You gain +1 Boon on Crafting checks to disable a device or open a lock.

Seasoned Veteran.name: Seasoned Veteran
Seasoned Veteran.description: You battlefield experience makes you accustomed to engaging multiple foes. Your Engagement increases by +1, allowing you to simultaneously engage more adjacent foes.

Second Wind.name: Second Wind
Second Wind.description: Your physical hardiness allows you to push yourself beyond conventional limits.

Second Wind.name: Second Wind
Second Wind.description: You focus your energy and recover your Toughness score in Health.

Shapeshifter.name: Shapeshifter
Shapeshifter.description:
You possess supernatural ability to transform your body into the shapes of beasts.

You undergo a transformation where you assume the form of a beast that you are familiar with and which is half your level or less. While transformed you have the exact attributes and abilities of the chosen beast.

Your equipment is magically incorporated into the form that you take, however you gain no benefit from that equipment while transformed.

If your bestial form becomes Incapacitated you revert back to your normal form with any excess damage becoming Wounds. If your Morale is Broken while in beast form your transformation ends and any excess damage becomes Madness.

Beast Shape.name: Beast Shape
Beast Shape.description: You assume the form of a beast that you are familiar with of one-half your level or less.

Revert Shape.name: Revert Shape
Revert Shape.description: You end your bestial transformation, returning to your normal form.

Shield Bash.name: Shield Bash
Shield Bash.description: You are practiced at fighting with shield, using it to slam into and imbalance your foes.

Shield Bash.name: Shield Bash
Shield Bash.description: Following a basic Strike with your mainhand weapon, you Strike with your shield, causing the Staggered condition for one Round.

Shield Charge.name: Shield Charge
Shield Charge.description: A defensive technique in which you drive forward, slamming and pushing foes out of your path. You charge up to 6 spaces in a straight line and perform an offhand shield Strike against each successive foe along your path.

Shield Charge.name: Shield Charge
Shield Charge.description: You charge forward in a straight line, passing through the space of any creatures you encounter and making a Strike against each successive foe. Any creature Critically Hit by the attack may be pushed into an adjacent space of your choosing. You may not end your charge in the same space as another creature.

Shield Training.name: Shield Training
Shield Training.description:
You are trained in the techniques of using a shield for defense and attack.

All Ranged weapon attacks against you are made with +1 Bane and you gain a +1 Skill bonus to attacks which use your shield.

Shield Ward.name: Shield Ward
Shield Ward.description: You have mastered a specialized technique to incorporate a physical shield into the Ward gesture. You may ignore the free-hand requirement for spells using the Ward gesture while you have a Shield equipped.

Skirmisher.name: Skirmisher
Skirmisher.description: You are adept at entering and exiting the fray. When moving out of the Engagement radius of an enemy, that enemy has 2 Banes to any Disengagement Strike against you.

Snakeblood.name: Snakeblood
Snakeblood.description: Your supernatural toughness makes you resistant to venoms and toxins. You gain +5 Resistance to Poison damage.

Soothe.name: Soothe
Soothe.description: You administer a soothing Performance which rallies your allies, restoring Morale.

Soothe.name: Soothe
Soothe.description: You perform a calming verse, benefiting all allies who can perceive you within 12 feet. Make a Performance Check against the Madness threshold of each ally. On success, each ally's Morale is restored.

Spellblade.name: Spellblade
Spellblade.description:
You are an arcane warrior who can weave together Strike and Spell relying on both martial and arcane techniques in battle. The physical strikes of your weaponry partially substitute for the somatic gestures of traditional spellcraft.

After performing a Strike attack, the cost of the next Spell you cast during the same Turn is reduced by 1 Action.

Steadfast.name: Steadfast
Steadfast.description: Your patient resolve allows you to endure psychologically grueling ordeals with steadfast determination.

Steadfast Resolve.name: Steadfast Resolve
Steadfast Resolve.description: You harden yourself against demoralization. Your Morale is increased by your Wisdom score and you temporarily gain the Resolute condition.

Still Lake.name: Still Lake
Still Lake.description:
Your life experiences provide serenity that allows you to resist the attempted manipulation of others.

Skill Attacks against you from any of the Social skills are made with 2 Banes.

Strategic Repositioning.name: Strategic Repositioning
Strategic Repositioning.description:
You are always thinking ahead about where to position yourself should danger loom. Before Turn 1 of a Combat encounter, provided that you are not Unaware, you may immediately move 1 Space in any permitted direction.

If multiple combatants have this feature, repositioning occurs in reverse order of Initiative.

Strike First.name: Strike First
Strike First.description: Shoot first, ask questions later. You gain +1 Boon on any Strike or Spell attack against an enemy whose initiative score is lower than your own.

Strong Grip.name: Strong Grip
Strong Grip.description: Your grasp of your weaponry is firm and unyielding. You can perform Actions which require a free hand while wielding a two-handed weapon. Attempts to Disarm you are made with +2 Banes.

Stunning Strike.name: Stunning Strike
Stunning Strike.description: An challenging unarmed technique which targets vital pressure points on the bodies of your adversaries. You unleash a debilitating strike which, if successful, leaves your enemy Stunned.

Stunning Strike.name: Stunning Strike
Stunning Strike.description: You Strike a vital pressure point, inflicting Stun on your enemy for 1 Round if successful.

Subtle Extrication.name: Subtle Extrication
Subtle Extrication.description: You understand how to move away from an opponent without exposing yourself to the worst attacks in return. Any Disengagement Attack against you is performed without the 2 Boons that would ordinarily apply to such an attack.

Sundering Strike.name: Sundering Strike
Sundering Strike.description: You know a martial technique to exploit the weakest points of an enemy's defenses, exposing them to further harm.

Sundering Strike.name: Sundering Strike
Sundering Strike.description: You make a Strike with your mainhand weapon which, if successful, applies the Exposed condition to your target for 3 rounds. This attack is Difficult to perform and deals reduced damage.

Surgeweaver.name: Surgeweaver
Surgeweaver.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Lightning. Spells which use this Rune cause the Shocked condition on Critical Hits.

The Shocked effect lasts for 1 Round, deals half your Intellect score as Lightning damage to Morale, and applies the Staggered condition.

Swashbuckler.name: Swashbuckler
Swashbuckler.description: Your bravado inspires your allies and cowes your enemies. When you Dodge or Parry a Strike, the attacker loses Morale equal to your Presence attribute. When you achieve a Critical Hit, all nearby allies who can see you gain Morale equal to your Presence attribute.

Swipe.name: Swipe
Swipe.description: You perform a broad swipe with your weapon, hitting two adjacent targets within your weapon range.

Swipe.name: Swipe
Swipe.description: You perform a Strike against two adjacent enemies, attacking both of them using a single swing of your great weapon.

Tactician.name: Tactician
Tactician.description: You are a cunning battlefield tactician, able to organize and direct your allies to act with increased effectiveness.

Tactical Plan.name: Tactical Plan
Tactical Plan.description: Using 10 words or fewer, describe a course of action to an ally who acts after you in Initiative order. If that ally carries out your described plan later in the same Round, they gain +2 Boons on any dice rolls associated with that plan. The Gamemaster may arbitrate whether or not the plan was followed.

Testudo.name: Testudo
Testudo.description: You are highly skilled in using shields to adopt a defensive posture. You gain double the benefit of the Guarded condition against Weapon Attacks while wielding a shield.

Theory of Armaments.name: Theory of Armaments
Theory of Armaments.description: The theory and physics of combat are a matter of study for you. You gain a +1 Skill Bonus to attacks using weapons in the Balanced or Projectile categories.

Thick Skin.name: Thick Skin
Thick Skin.description: Your physical toughness makes you more resistant to harm. You gain +2 Resistance to Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing damage.

Thread the Needle.name: Thread the Needle
Thread the Needle.description: You concentrate to fire a shot into the swirl of melee. This attack benefits from Flanking as if it were a melee attack.

Thread the Needle.name: Thread the Needle
Thread the Needle.description: You fire a precise shot into melee combat, targeting an enemy which is engaged by one of your allies.

True Grit.name: True Grit
True Grit.description: Your physical tenacity allows you to remain composed while surrounded by foes. Your Engagement increases by +1, allowing you to simultaneously engage more adjacent foes.

Tumble Through.name: Tumble Through
Tumble Through.description: You can use your athleticism in dangerous situations to escape harm or bypass enemy combatants.

Tumble.name: Tumble
Tumble.description:
Make a Pathfinding skill Attack against an adjacent enemy contested by your target's Reflex defense.

On a success you may move up to twice your Stride, including the ability to pass through your target enemy's space, without provoking any Disengagement reactions.

On a failure your movement is blocked and your remain in your current position.

Twinned Shot.name: Twinned Shot
Twinned Shot.description: You prepare two shots to fire simultaneously at a single target.

Twinned Shot.name: Twinned Shot
Twinned Shot.description: Using this Difficult technique, you fire two projectiles at once making two Strike attacks against the same target.

Unarmed Blocking.name: Unarmed Blocking
Unarmed Blocking.description: Your honed reflexes and physical toughness allow you to block enemy blows using your bare arms. While Unarmed, half your Toughness score contributes to your Block defense.

Unarmed Weapon Training.name: Unarmed Weapon Training
Unarmed Weapon Training.description:
You are educated and trained in the arts of unarmed combat.

You gain a +1 Skill bonus to attacks using melee weapons in the Unarmed or Natural categories.

Unshakeable Stance.name: Unshakeable Stance
Unshakeable Stance.description: You cannot be unvoluntarily Moved or knocked Prone by any action that is not a Critical Success rolled by an enemy or a Critical Failure rolled by yourself.

Uppercut.name: Uppercut
Uppercut.description: A two-handed weapon technique where you swing your weapon upwards, making a second Strike with the backswing of your weapon.

Uppercut.name: Uppercut
Uppercut.description: Following a basic Strike attack which did not critically miss, you Strike the same target again with the backswing of your weapon at reduced Action cost.

Voidcaller.name: Voidcaller
Voidcaller.description:
You are highly skilled in weaving the Rune of Shadow. Spells which use this Rune cause the Entropy condition on Critical Hits.

The Entropy effect lasts for 1 Round, deals half your Presence score as Void damage to Morale, and applies the Frightened condition.

Vow of Animus.name: Vow of Animus
Vow of Animus.description: You swear a vow to destroy a specific character or creature. You gain +2 Boons to Strike or Spell attacks against to subject of your vow. You may only swear such a vow against one enemy at a time. Swearing a new vow relinquishes your prior vow.

Vow of Animus.name: Vow of Animus
Vow of Animus.description: You vow to vanquish a specific foe who becomes the subject of your animus.

War Mage.name: War Mage
War Mage.description: Your spellcraft is honed as a weapon of war to thwart the incantations of other magi. You may ask the Gamemaster if you know a Rune capable of countering an enemy spell, even if you do not recognize the spell being cast. You gain +2 Boons to any Counterspell attempt.

Weak Points.name: Weak Points
Weak Points.description: You identify moments of opportunity to strike at an enemy's weak points. When attacking a target that is Unaware, Flanked, or Exposed using Finesse weaponry, you gain +2 damage to any Strike.

Wrestler.name: Wrestler
Wrestler.description: You are able to subdue opponents using your physical Strength.

Grapple.name: Grapple
Grapple.description: Perform a melee attack against an adjacent target. If successful, both you and your target are Restrained for 1 Round.

Zealous Smite.name: Zealous Smite
Zealous Smite.description: You can imbue righteous power into your blow with a heavy weapon.

Zealous Smite.name: Zealous Smite
Zealous Smite.condition: You are attacking an Exposed enemy with a Heavy weapon.
Zealous Smite.description: You Strike using a Strength-based weapon. The attack becomes Deadly and any damage dealt is Radiant.
